s.text: This may reflect the fact that TNF-? therapies for IBD are aimed at efficiently clearing TNF-?, while IL-10 therapies must increase IL-10 and recombinant IL-10 is likely too rapidly cleared from the circulation after in vivo administration to provide a uniform protection [ 55 ] . On the other hand, IL-10 gene transfer technology has been used with some success in models of colitis, however its effectiveness is also variable.
